channel.title: Binny V A
channel.description: Binny VA is the personal site of Binny V Abraham, programmer in many langauges. Free source code of programs in languages like Tcl/Tk, C++, Perl, Javascript etc. I provide sevices like CD creation, free website creation, Speeches CD Sales, Speech Recording etc. There are also some technical stuff like tutorials for many languages, games and a few midi(music) files.

item.title: SedGUI V 1.00.A Beta
item.description: SedGUI is a GUI version of the Sed(Stream EDitor) program in Unix.

item.title: Advaced JavaScript Tutorial
item.description: A tutorial for javascript scripting language. Teaches how to develop and code JavaScript scripts and how to embed the scripts in HTML for websites.

item.title: Jasfer V 1.00.A Beta
item.description: Jasfer or JavaScript Feed Reader is a JavaScript program to read RSS feeds and display it in a HTML file. This is very customizable as the design can be easily changed using CSS and new features can be added just as easily.

item.title: Bin-Blog
item.description: Bin-Blog is created - My online Journal, my web log, my blog. Know about the latest - as soon as I do.

item.title: BD's SourceForge Release
item.description: BD V2.00.A is released using SourceForge. You can download it here.

item.title: Binny's Software DataBase
item.description: A complete list of all the softwares that were released by Binny's Softwares now available as - Binny's Software DataBase

item.title: RSSPilot V 1.00.A Beta
item.description: RSSPilot is a software that can be used to create RSS feeds for your web. One can also use it to read offline RSS feeds. Created using Perl using the Tk module. This RSS Feed was created using this software.

item.title: TagView V 2.01.A
item.description: A new version of TagView is released. Support for more languages and other platforms added. TagView is a program that will find all the functions of a script that is given as the command line argument and display the function and the line number and also the description if one is provided in the script. If any function is double-clicked, it will be opened in an external editor with the seclected procedure as the selected line.

item.title: Abridged Perl/Tk Tutorial
item.description: A tutorial for Perl/Tk language. Teaches how to create and code GUI(Graphical User Interface) programs using perl language using the Tk module.

item.title: ABC of JavaScript : An Interactive JavaScript Tutorial
item.description: An Interactive tutorial for javascript or JScript language. Teaches how to develop and code JavaScript scripts and how to embed the scripts in HTML for websites. This tutor is aimed at beginners of the language.
